commit message:
Italian strings resources revision.

A first revision of the Italian strings Android resources. Among others, replaced word 'Enigma' with 'Problema', avoided use of obsolete or uncommon words, substituted ellipse ('...') with HTML entity (…).

Italian HTML assets revision.

A first revision of the Italian HTML assets. Among others, replaced word 'Enigma' with 'Problema', substituted accented letters with HTML entities, corrected a couple of typos, made translation more consistent with the string resources.

Italian resources second revision.

Some small changes and corrected a couple of typos.

Extracted two Toast strings.

Extracted two strings from Java code which are shown in Toast, and so are visible to user. Translated in Italian.

Merge pull request #15 from alessandrodalbello/master

Italian update - thanks Alessandro!

work on DIAL. fix puzzle crash in landscape
force portrait mode when not enough screen estate. edit read
